name: Rovastar & Unchained - Ambrosia Mystic (Dark Heart Mix)
description: Rovastar & Unchained - Ambrosia Mystic (Dark Heart Mix)
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2
fDecay=0.942
fVideoEchoZoom=1.0065
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.5
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=5
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.7999
fWaveScale=1.54922
fWaveSmoothing=0.75
fWaveParam=0
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.75
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.95
fWarpAnimSpeed=1
fWarpScale=1
fZoomExponent=1
fShader=0
zoom=1.040604
rot=0
cx=0.47
cy=0.5
dx=0
dy=0
warp=1
sx=1
sy=1
wave_r=0.5
wave_g=0.5
wave_b=0.5
wave_x=0.5
wave_y=0.5
ob_size=0.01
ob_r=0
ob_g=0
ob_b=0
ob_a=0
ib_size=0.01
ib_r=0.25
ib_g=0.25
ib_b=0.25
ib_a=0
nMotionVectorsX=12
nMotionVectorsY=9
mv_dx=0
mv_dy=0
mv_l=0.9
mv_r=1
mv_g=1
mv_b=1
mv_a=0
per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.143);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5+0.5*sin(time*0.896);
per_frame_3=q8 = (bass+bass_att)*0.5;
per_pixel_1=state_scalar=if(equal(q8,3),-.1,if(equal(q8,2),2,1));
per_pixel_2=location = sin(ang*10+time+abs(pow(1+rad,q8)+x*10%5));
per_pixel_3=zoom = zoom+.08*state_scalar*location;
per_pixel_4=rot = rot+.02*state_scalar*location;
per_pixel_5=zoomexp = 1/(pow(q8,q8*10));
per_pixel_6=zoomexp = if(above(rad,0.8),1,zoomexp);
